name: Branding Logo as favicon on New/Blank Tabs - Fx 6+
description:
For Firefox 6+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This style replaces the default favicon on New/Blank tabs and bookmarked sites that do not have a favicon when in the Urlbar, on the Bookmarks Toolbar, in the Bookmark folders, and in the Bookmark Sidebar with a Fx Branding logo icon.

Fx/Beta = Orange Firefox logo icon
Aurora = Aurora brand logo icon
Nightly = Nightly brand logo icon

Tested on Firefox 6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
additional_info:
Updated 03-24-2012
Bookmarklets(JavaScript based bookmarks) now have a styled favicon...

Updated 03-21-2012
Due to Bug 731459 - New "visited" livemarks icons gets too much attention...

Updated 02-27-2012
Due to Bug 706850 - Need a "visited" livemark item icon...

Updated 12-21-2011
Fixed default favicon issue with (https and ftp) bookmarked sites on Bookmarks Toolbar.

Updated 11-30-2011
Restored default favicons for RSS Live Bookmarks.(Thanks to: user 15980)

Updated 11-19-2011
Default favicons in Urlbar Auto-Complete drop-down results now styled.(Thanks to: user 15980)

Updated 11-10-2011
Style now styles bookmarked sites that do not have a favicon on the bookmark toolbar and in bookmarks folders and in bookmark sidebar(thanks to user 169).

Updated 08-20-2011
Style now applies to the Urlbar favicon of New/Blank Tabs also.
